conversation.speaker: fairy
conversation.text: You've done well, little one, but what Marusan said was no fairytale. The Old One is awakening.

conversation.speaker: fairy
conversation.text: We human and fae have wasted too much time, being unable to reach a compromise. I fear it is already too late.

conversation.speaker: Mimi
conversation.text: Meow meow meow. (No it's not. You still have me. Whatever it is, I'll kick its butt. No exceptions.)

conversation.speaker: fairy
conversation.text: Oh to be young and optimistic... I suppose you're right. Even when the world is ending, we must not let despair triumph over our hope.

conversation.speaker: potion
conversation.text: You have receive the Elder Faerie's Blessing (upon reaching 0 hp, heal 1 hp and become invulnerable for 5 seconds). Press [3] to use.

conversation.speaker: fairy
conversation.text: I can understand you, and it's no pocket trick. You've become articulate in your journey of strife.

conversation.speaker: Mimi
conversation.text: I... what? Wait! I can speak! I can really speak!

conversation.speaker: fairy
conversation.text: Yes, and you will for many years to come. I would tell everyone about this, but I want your stories to come from your own mouth when you return to the Fablewoods.

conversation.speaker: fairy
conversation.text: The Old One cannot be harmed by known magic. The only way to defeat it is to reflect its magic back at it, but no one has been able to withstand its power long enough to defeat it.

conversation.speaker: fairy
conversation.text: But you are different from the others. I knew that from the second I chose you from your litter.

conversation.speaker: fairy
conversation.text: Mimi... you must go now, but promise me, promise me, promise me this: you will come back alive.
